mapper.insert: insert into member_table(m_id, m_password, m_name, m_email, m_phone, m_likegame) values(#{m_id},#{m_password},#{m_name},#{m_email},#{m_phone},#{m_likegame})
mapper.select: select m_id from member_table where m_id=#{m_id}
select * from member_table where m_id=#{m_id} and m_password=#{m_password}
select * from member_table order by m_number desc limit #{pagingStart}, 3
select * from member_table order by m_number desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
mapper.update: update member_table set m_point = m_point + #{point} where m_id = #{id}
update member_table set m_point = m_point + #{m_point} where m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.select: select * from member_table where m_id = #{m_id} and m_point >= #{nft_price}
mapper.update: update member_table set m_point = m_point - #{nft_price} where m_id = #{m_id}
